column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Stopped by Common Bond early in the AM because it came highly recommended by a few friends. We ordered the almond croissant
column3: and hazelnut chocolate muffin. The standout item was by far the almond croissant. It's hard to find a good almond croissant and this one definitely lived up to my expectations. The chocolate chip walnut cookie was okay
column4: and the muffin was definitely lacking in flavor. It seems like their croissants are what they are known for
column5: so highly recommend those if in the Montrose area!
